overview: The gay adult world is about to change forever. While brothers have been a novelty in the past, they have been few and far between. Now, Elite Male presents the Visconti Triplets. The Triplets first film exposes their life behind the scenes at a photo shoot. It captures their smiles and eroticism-and the Triplets will capture your heart. Yes, it's real. You're not seeing double. You're seeing triple. It's a dream come true!
title: Brotherhood Secrets
